verses.text_uthmani: حمٓ

translations.text: Ḥâ-Mĩm.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ha-meem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ

translations.text: By the clear Book!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walkitabi almubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةٍ مُّبَـٰرَكَةٍ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ

translations.text: Indeed, We sent it down on a blessed night,<sup foot_note=77346>1</sup> for We always warn ˹against evil˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna anzalnahu fee laylatin mubarakatininna kunna munthireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فِيهَا يُفْرَقُ كُلُّ أَمْرٍ حَكِيمٍ

translations.text: On that night every matter of wisdom is ordained
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Feeha yufraqu kullu amrin hakeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْرًا مِّنْ عِندِنَآ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ

translations.text: by a command from Us, for We have always sent ˹messengers˺
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Amran min AAindina inna kunnamursileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translations.text: as a mercy from your Lord. He ˹alone˺ is truly the All-Hearing, All-Knowing—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rahmatan min rabbika innahu huwa assameeAAualAAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

translations.text: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, if only you had sure faith.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbi assamawati wal-ardiwama baynahuma in kuntum mooqineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.text: There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. He ˹alone˺ gives life and causes death. ˹He is˺ your Lord, and the Lord of your forefathers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La ilaha illa huwa yuhyeewayumeetu rabbukum warabbu aba-ikumu al-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ يَلْعَبُونَ

translations.text: In fact, they are in doubt, amusing themselves.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal hum fee shakkin yalAAaboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱرْتَقِبْ يَوْمَ تَأْتِى ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: Wait then ˹O Prophet˺ for the day ˹when˺ the sky will be veiled in haze,<sup foot_note=77347>1</sup> clearly visible,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fartaqib yawma ta/tee assamaobidukhanin mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَغْشَى ٱلنَّاسَ ۖ هَـٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

translations.text: overwhelming the people. ˹They will cry,˺ “This is a painful torment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yaghsha annasa hathaAAathabun aleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رَّبَّنَا ٱكْشِفْ عَنَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: Our Lord! Remove ˹this˺ torment from us, ˹and˺ we will certainly believe.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbana ikshif AAanna alAAathabainna mu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: How can they be reminded when a messenger has already come to them, making things clear,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Anna lahumu aththikrawaqad jaahum rasoolun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا۟ مُعَلَّمٌ مَّجْنُونٌ

translations.text: then they turned away from him, saying, “A madman, taught by others!”?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma tawallaw AAanhu waqaloomuAAallamun majnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا كَاشِفُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّكُمْ عَآئِدُونَ

translations.text: Indeed, We will remove ˹that˺ torment for a while, and you ˹Meccans˺ will return ˹to disbelief˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna kashifoo alAAathabiqaleelan innakum AAa-idoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ نَبْطِشُ ٱلْبَطْشَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

translations.text: ˹Then˺ on the Day We will deal ˹you˺ the fiercest blow, We will surely inflict punishment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma nabtishu albatshataalkubra inna muntaqimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ

translations.text: Indeed, before them We tested Pharaoh’s people: a noble messenger came to them,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad fatanna qablahum qawmafirAAawna wajaahum rasoolun kareem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَنْ أَدُّوٓا۟ إِلَىَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ

translations.text: ˹proclaiming,˺ “Hand over the servants of Allah to me.<sup foot_note=77348>1</sup> I am truly a trustworthy messenger to you.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: An addoo ilayya AAibada Allahiinnee lakum rasoolun ameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَن لَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: And do not be arrogant with Allah. I have certainly come to you with a compelling proof.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waan la taAAloo AAala Allahiinnee ateekum bisultanin mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنِّى عُذْتُ بِرَبِّى وَرَبِّكُمْ أَن تَرْجُمُونِ

translations.text: And indeed, I seek refuge with my Lord and your Lord so you do not stone me ˹to death˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innee AAuthtu birabbee warabbikuman tarjumoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ لِى فَٱعْتَزِلُونِ

translations.text: ˹But˺ if you do not believe me, then let me be.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-in lam tu/minoo lee faAAtaziloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌ مُّجْرِمُونَ

translations.text: Ultimately, he cried out to his Lord, “These are a wicked people!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FadaAAa rabbahu anna haola-iqawmun mujrimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى لَيْلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ

translations.text: ˹Allah responded,˺ “Leave with My servants at night, for you will surely be pursued.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faasri biAAibadee laylan innakummuttabaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱتْرُكِ ٱلْبَحْرَ رَهْوًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ جُندٌ مُّغْرَقُونَ

translations.text: And leave the sea parted, for they are certainly an army bound to drown.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watruki albahra rahwaninnahum jundun mughraqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَمْ تَرَكُوا۟ مِن جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ

translations.text: ˹Imagine˺ how many gardens and springs the tyrants<sup foot_note=77349>1</sup> left behind,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kam tarakoo min jannatin waAAuyoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَزُرُوعٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ

translations.text: as well as ˹various˺ crops and splendid residences,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WazurooAAin wamaqamin kareem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَعْمَةٍ كَانُوا۟ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهِينَ

translations.text: and luxuries which they fully enjoyed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WanaAAmatin kanoo feeha fakiheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَوْرَثْنَـٰهَا قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ

translations.text: So it was. And We awarded it ˹all˺ to another people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kathalika waawrathnahaqawman akhareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَا بَكَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنظَرِينَ

translations.text: Neither heaven nor earth wept over them, nor was their fate delayed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fama bakat AAalayhimu assamaowal-ardu wama kanoo munthareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْمُهِينِ

translations.text: And We certainly delivered the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad najjayna banee isra-eelamina alAAathabi almuheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مِن فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيًا مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ

translations.text: of Pharaoh. He was truly a tyrant, a transgressor.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Min firAAawna innahu kana AAaliyanmina almusrifeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدِ ٱخْتَرْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: And indeed, We chose the Israelites knowingly above the others.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqadi ikhtarnahum AAalaAAilmin AAala alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَـٰٓؤٌا۟ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: And We showed them signs in which there was a clear test.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waataynahum mina al-ayatima feehi balaon mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَيَقُولُونَ

translations.text: Indeed, these ˹Meccans˺ say,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna haola-i layaqooloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ

translations.text: “There is nothing beyond our first death, and we will never be resurrected.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In hiya illa mawtatuna al-oolawama nahnu bimunshareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأْتُوا۟ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.text: Bring ˹back˺ our forefathers, if what you say is true.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa/too bi-aba-ina inkuntum sadiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ

translations.text: Are they superior to the people of Tubba’<sup foot_note=77350>1</sup> and those before them? We destroyed them ˹all˺, ˹for˺ they were truly wicked.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ahum khayrun am qawmu tubbaAAin wallatheenamin qablihim ahlaknahum innahum kanoo mujrimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَـٰعِبِينَ

translations.text: We did not create the heavens and the earth and everything in between for sport.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama khalaqna assamawatiwal-arda wama baynahuma laAAibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَا خَلَقْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: We only created them for a purpose, but most of these ˹pagans˺ do not know.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma khalaqnahuma illabilhaqqi walakinna aktharahum layaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ مِيقَـٰتُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.text: Surely the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision is the time appointed for all—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna yawma alfasli meeqatuhumajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى مَوْلًى عَن مَّوْلًى شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ

translations.text: the Day no kith or kin will be of benefit to another whatsoever, nor will they be helped,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma la yughnee mawlan AAan mawlanshay-an wala hum yunsaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

translations.text: except those shown mercy by Allah. He is truly the Almighty, Most Merciful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa man rahima Allahuinnahu huwa alAAazeezu arraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

translations.text: Surely ˹the fruit of˺ the tree of Zaqqûm<sup foot_note=77351>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna shajarata azzaqqoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: طَعَامُ ٱلْأَثِيمِ

translations.text: will be the food of the evildoer.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: TaAAamu al-atheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَٱلْمُهْلِ يَغْلِى فِى ٱلْبُطُونِ

translations.text: Like molten metal, it will boil in the bellies
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kalmuhli yaghlee fee albutoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَغَلْىِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ

translations.text: like the boiling of hot water.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaghalyi alhameem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: خُذُوهُ فَٱعْتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.text: ˹It will be said,˺ “Seize them and drag them into the depths of the Hellfire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Khuthoohu faAAtiloohu ilasawa-i aljaheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا۟ فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِۦ مِنْ عَذَابِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ

translations.text: Then pour over their heads the torment of boiling water.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma subboo fawqa ra/sihi min AAathabialhameem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ذُقْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْكَرِيمُ

translations.text: ˹The wicked will be told,˺ “Taste this. You mighty, noble one!<sup foot_note=77352>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thuq innaka anta alAAazeezu alkareem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمْتَرُونَ

translations.text: This is truly what you ˹all˺ used to doubt.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna hatha ma kuntum bihitamtaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى مَقَامٍ أَمِينٍ

translations.text: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna almuttaqeena fee maqamin ameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ

translations.text: amid Gardens and springs,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fee jannatin waAAuyoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَلْبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٍ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ

translations.text: dressed in fine silk and rich brocade, facing one another.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yalbasoona min sundusin wa-istabraqin mutaqabileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ

translations.text: So it will be. And We will pair them to maidens with gorgeous eyes.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kathalika wazawwajnahum bihoorinAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَـٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ

translations.text: There they will call for every fruit in serenity.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: YadAAoona feeha bikulli fakihatinamineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ إِلَّا ٱلْمَوْتَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ ۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.text: There they will never taste death, beyond the first death. And He will protect them from the punishment of the Hellfire—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yathooqoona feehaalmawta illa almawtata al-oola wawaqahum AAathabaaljaheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَضْلًا مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ

translations.text: as ˹an act of˺ grace from your Lord. That is ˹truly˺ the ultimate triumph.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fadlan min rabbika thalikahuwa alfawzu alAAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

translations.text: Indeed, We have made this ˹Quran˺ easy in your own language ˹O Prophet˺ so perhaps they will be mindful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-innama yassarnahu bilisanikalaAAallahum yatathakkaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱرْتَقِبْ إِنَّهُم مُّرْتَقِبُونَ

translations.text: Wait then! They too are certainly waiting.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fartaqib innahum murtaqiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
